subtitle: A great family meal. Look out in the shops for different colours and flavours of pasta shells.

method.text: Heat oil in a pan. Fry onion and garlic until softened. Stir in tuna, prawns, cream, lemon rind and seasoning to taste. Leave to heat through gently while you cook the pasta. Do not boil.
Cook pasta shells in boiling salted water until al dente or just tender. Drain well and return to pan.
Add sauce and toss together. Serve hot.

title: Seafood pasta
